conduits.name: Astral Protection
conduits.description: Reincarnation's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>3.0 - 10</dynamic> min, and reincarnating instantly grants you Astral Shift.

conduits.name: Refreshing Waters
conduits.description: Your Healing Surge is <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic> more effective on yourself.

conduits.name: Vital Accretion
conduits.description: Your Earth Elemental increases your maximum health by <dynamic>20% - 40%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Thunderous Paws
conduits.description: Ghost Wolf increases your movement speed by an additional <dynamic>10% - 40%</dynamic> for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 60 sec.

conduits.name: Totemic Surge
conduits.description: The cooldowns of Tremor Totem, Earthbind Totem, and Capacitor Totem are reduced by <dynamic>1 sec - 15 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Spiritual Resonance
conduits.description:
<condition>Heroism</condition>
<dynamic>Heroism - Heroism</dynamic>

Bloodlust or any similar effects also grant you <dynamic>4.0 sec</dynamic> of 

<spec>Enhancement</spec>
<dynamic>Spirit Walk</dynamic>

<spec>Elemental</spec><spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>Spiritwalker's Grace</dynamic>

conduits.name: Crippling Hex
conduits.description: Enemies affected by your Hex deal <dynamic>8% - 15%</dynamic> reduced damage for 8 sec after Hex is removed.

conduits.name: High Voltage
conduits.description: Lightning Bolt has a <dynamic>30% - 60%</dynamic> chance to generate an extra stack of Fulmination.

conduits.name: Shake the Foundations
conduits.description: Casting Earthquake has a <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic> chance to instantly cast Chain Lightning at a random enemy in the Earthquake.

conduits.name: Call of Flame
conduits.description:
<condition>Storm Elemental</condition>
<dynamic>Storm Elemental - Storm Elemental</dynamic>

Fire Elemental lasts <dynamic>15%</dynamic> longer.

conduits.name: Earth and Sky
conduits.description: Earth Shock and Elemental Blast's damage are increased by <dynamic>7.0% - 14%</dynamic> for each stack of Fulmination they discharge.

conduits.name: Unruly Winds
conduits.description: Windfury Weapon has a <dynamic>40% - 80%</dynamic> chance to trigger a third attack.

conduits.name: Focused Lightning
conduits.description: Maelstrom Weapon increases the damage or healing of your next spell by an additional <dynamic>4.0% - 10%</dynamic> per stack.

conduits.name: Chilled to the Core
conduits.description: Frost Shock has a <dynamic>20% - 33.33%</dynamic> chance to grant 2 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

conduits.name: Embrace of Earth
conduits.description: Earth Shield increases your healing done to the target by an additional <dynamic>5.0% - 12%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Magma Fist
conduits.description: Lava Lash has an additional <dynamic>25% - 50%</dynamic> critical strike chance against enemies affected by your Flame Shock.

conduits.name: Swirling Currents
conduits.description: Using Healing Stream Totem increases the healing of your next 3 Healing Surge, Healing Wave, or Riptide spells by <dynamic>20% - 40%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Heavy Rainfall
conduits.description: Using Healing Tide Totem increases the healing of your Healing Rain by <dynamic>150% - 281.25%</dynamic> for 20 sec.

conduits.name: Nature's Reach
conduits.description: Chain Heal has a <dynamic>40% - 80%</dynamic> chance to jump to an additional ally.

conduits.name: Elysian Dirge
conduits.description: Vesper Totem is <dynamic>100% - 200%</dynamic> more effective against the target nearest to it.

conduits.name: Essential Extraction
conduits.description: Fae Transfusion deals <dynamic>10% - 20%</dynamic> increased damage, and channels <dynamic>10%</dynamic> faster.

conduits.name: Lavish Harvest
conduits.description: The critical strike chance of Chain Harvest is increased by <dynamic>10.0% - 17%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Tumbling Waves
conduits.description: Primordial Wave has a <dynamic>20% - 40%</dynamic> chance to not incur its cooldown.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, increasing movement speed by 30%. You may reactivate Soulshape to teleport 10 yds forward.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 10 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Vesper Totem
covenants.description:
Summon a totem at the target location for 30 sec. Your next 3 damage spells or abilities will cause the totem to radiate (50% of Spell power + 50% of Attack power) Arcane damage to up to 6 enemies near the totem, and your next 3 healing spells will heal up to 6 allies near the totem for (100% of Spell power + 100% of Attack power) health.

Casting this ability again while the totem is active will relocate the totem.

covenants.name: Fae Transfusion
covenants.description:
Transfer the life force of up to 4 enemies in the targeted area, dealing [(50% of Spell power + 50% of Attack power) * 3 / 0.5] Nature damage to each enemy over 3 sec. 

Pressing Fae Transfusion again within 20 sec will release 25% of all damage from Fae Transfusion, healing up to 8 allies near yourself.

covenants.name: Primordial Wave
covenants.description:
Blast your target with a Primordial Wave, dealing (65% of Spell power + 65% of Attack power) Shadow damage and apply Flame Shock to an enemy, or 

<spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>heal an ally for (65% of Spell power + 65% of Attack power) and apply Riptide to them</dynamic>

<spec>Elemental</spec><spec>Enhancement</spec>
<dynamic>heal an ally for (65% of Spell power + 65% of Attack power)</dynamic>

Your next 

<spec>Elemental</spec>
<dynamic>Lava Burst</dynamic>

<spec>Enhancement</spec>
<dynamic>Lightning Bolt</dynamic>

<spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>Healing Wave</dynamic>

 will also hit all targets affected by your 

<spec>Elemental</spec>
<dynamic>Flame Shock</dynamic>

<spec>Enhancement</spec><spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>Riptide</dynamic>

covenants.name: Chain Harvest
covenants.description:
Send a wave of anima at the target, which then jumps to additional nearby targets. Deals (45% of Spell power) Shadow damage to up to 5 enemies, and restores (120% of Spell power) health to up to 5 allies.

For each target critically struck, the cooldown of Chain Harvest is reduced by 5 sec.

legendaries.name: Earthen Harmony
legendaries.description: Earth Shield healing is increased by 300% if your Earth Shield target is below 50% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.

legendaries.name: Primal Tide Core
legendaries.description: Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

legendaries.name: Spiritwalker's Tidal Totem
legendaries.description: After using Mana Tide Totem, the cast time of Healing Wave and Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and the mana cost of Chain Heal and Healing Wave is reduced by 100% for 10 sec.

legendaries.name: Jonat's Natural Focus
legendaries.description: Healing Wave and Healing Surge increase the healing done by your next Chain Heal by 0%, stacking up to 0 times.

legendaries.name: Primal Lava Actuators
legendaries.description: Each time Flame Shock deals Periodic damage, increase the damage of your next Lava Lash by 10% and reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.

legendaries.name: Witch Doctor's Wolf Bones
legendaries.description: Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 5%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 2.0 sec.

legendaries.name: Legacy of the Frost Witch
legendaries.description: Consuming 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and cause your next Stormstrike to deal 100% increased damage.

legendaries.name: Doom Winds
legendaries.description:
Dropping Windfury Totem grants you 100% inceased chance to gain Windfury Weapon for 8 sec. 

This can only occur once every 1 min.

legendaries.name: Windspeaker's Lava Resurgence
legendaries.description: When you consume 6 or more stacks of Fulmination with Earth Shock, gain Lava Surge and increase the damage of your next Lava Burst by 6%.

legendaries.name: Echoes of Great Sundering
legendaries.description: When you consume 6 or more stacks of Fulmination with Earth Shock, your next Earthquake will be instant cast and deal 6% additional damage.

legendaries.name: Elemental Equilibrium
legendaries.description: Dealing direct Fire damage increases the damage of your next Frost spell by 30%. Dealing Frost damage increases the damage of your next Nature spell by 25%. Dealing Nature damage increases the damage of your next Fire spell by 20%.

legendaries.name: Skybreaker's Fiery Demise
legendaries.description:
Flame Shock damage over time critical strikes reduce the cooldown of 

<condition>Storm Elemental</condition>
<dynamic>Storm Elemental</dynamic>

Fire Elemental by 

<condition>Storm Elemental</condition>
<dynamic>1.0</dynamic>

1.0 sec, and Flame Shock has a 30% increased critical strike chance.

legendaries.name: Chains of Devastation
legendaries.description: Casting Chain Heal makes your next Chain Lightning instant cast. Casting Chain Lightning makes your next Chain Heal instant cast.

legendaries.name: Deeply Rooted Elements
legendaries.description:
<spec>Enhancement</spec>
<dynamic>Using</dynamic>

<spec>Elemental</spec><spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>Casting</dynamic>

 

<spec>Restoration</spec>
<dynamic>Riptide</dynamic>

<spec>Elemental</spec>
<dynamic>Lava Burst</dynamic>

<spec>Enhancement</spec>
<dynamic>Stormstrike</dynamic>

 has a 5% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

legendaries.name: Deeptremor Stone
legendaries.description: Earth Elemental has a permanent Earthquake attached to it.

legendaries.name: Ancestral Reminder
legendaries.description:
<condition>Heroism</condition>
<dynamic>Heroism</dynamic>

Bloodlust or any similar effects last an additional 20.0 sec on you, and you gain an extra 10% Haste from any 

<condition>Heroism</condition>
<dynamic>Heroism</dynamic>

Bloodlust type effect.
